title: Use a Saved Payment Method
description: A returning customer is checking out and wants to use their credit card that is already saved to their account.

tasks.description: Log into their account and proceed to checkout.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is authenticated and ready to pay.

tasks.description: On the payment page, select their saved credit card from the list of payment options.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer chooses their stored payment method instead of re-entering the details.
The order is placed successfully using the tokenized, saved payment information.
